p: Cell culture: MDCK cells and human embryonic kidney (HEK) 293T cells were maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) (Invitrogen) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Invitrogen) at 37 °C in a 5% CO 2 incubator. Chinese hamster ovary (CHO-K1) cells were grown in DMEM/F12 medium supplemented with 10% FBS.
